item.title: Free email alias services
item.description: Firefox Relay DuckDuckGo email protection addy.io .

item.title: Scaling K8s to a large cluster
item.description: For K3s: Ensure master nodes have enough memory for etcd, Kubernetes API server, etc.

item.title: Get information about block devices and filesystems
item.description: It is recommended to use lsblk(8) command to get information about block devices, or lsblk --fs to get an overview of filesystems, or findmnt(8) to search in already mounted filesystems.

item.title: Check if input is pure ASCII
item.description: pbpaste | LC_ALL=C grep -q '[^ -~]' && echo "Non-ASCII" pbpaste | iconv -f ASCII -t ASCII >/dev/null || echo "Non-ASCII".

item.title: Experimental Nix commands
item.description: nix shell - run a shell in which the specified packages are available nix develop - run a bash shell that provides the build environment of a derivation nix run - run a Nix application References blog.ysndr.de/posts/guides/2021-12-01-nix-shells/ .

item.title: PostgreSQL Logical Replication
item.description: www.postgresql.org/docs/15/logical-replication-architecture.html Logical replication starts by copying a snapshot of the data on the publisher database.
